description: A 5% rate will remain in place on the Isle of Man until 31 March next year, the government says.
title: Coronavirus: VAT cut for IOM food and leisure sectors extended
title_page: Coronavirus: VAT cut for IOM food and leisure sectors extended - BBC News
maintext: In brighter news, Mr Quayle said the "vast majority" of Manx businesses were now running again following the lifting of Covid-19 lockdown restrictions on the island.
